TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ToolCreatedEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs

Docs.summary: Represents event arguments for the tool created event in the rehosted toolbox.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The event arguments contain data about the event that is passed to the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Toolbox.ToolCreatedEventHandler>.
## Examples [!code-cs[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)]

Docs.summary: Returns the components to be included in the tool creation event in the rehosted toolbox.
Docs.value: The <xref:System.Array> of type that contains the data passed to the .
